content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Greetings Max Müller. While discussing the rental price for the apartment in Magdeburg, let me emphasize securing the highest possible amount for myself. Beginning negotiations, I propose a price of 1200 Euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That is quite expensive for an unfurnished apartment. I am a student and my budget is limited. I am willing to pay 600 Euros per month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the proposed price significantly undervalues my property for the prime location and amenities it offers.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Here we can find common ground. I am, of course, not willing to pay the full price you mentioned. However, considering the city center location and proximity to amenities, I propose 850 Euros per month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: After considering your offer, I reluctantly accept the price of 900 Euros per month for the apartment. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
